title: Correlate Well Logs
description: A geologist correlates gamma ray and resistivity logs from a new well with logs from nearby offset wells to understand the stratigraphy.

tasks.description: Display the logs for the new well and three selected offset wells in a correlation view.
tasks.expected_outcome: All specified well logs are displayed side-by-side.

tasks.description: Identify and 'pick' the tops of key geological formations (e.g., 'Top Wilcox Sand') on each well log.
tasks.expected_outcome: The geologist accurately identifies and marks the formation tops on all wells.

tasks.description: Create a cross-section view showing the correlated formation tops between the wells.
tasks.expected_outcome: A geological cross-section is generated, illustrating the subsurface structure.
